落下了很多亏钱机会

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi.
As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder
The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount.
Risks explained 🧵

articles.description:
Literal pvp… can’t get more degen than this

McKenna: There's an on-chain game of russian roulette where people are betting $10k per round.
If you lose you lose everything. 90% of your stake goes to other players and 10% is burnt/rev share.
The Telegram is absolutely wild.
